title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 14 December 2016 - XWiki
content:
<meatcar> has quit  
05:09 <meatcar> has joined #xwiki  
06:44 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
07:19 <msmeria> has joined #xwiki  
07:36 <fcharton> has quit  
07:41 <fcharton> has joined #xwiki

08:49 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
08:59 <vmassol> has quit  
09:38 <gdelhumeau> has joined #xwiki  
09:41 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
09:51 <edvorg> has joined #xwiki  
10:39 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
11:05 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
11:05 <martinus\_\_> vmassol, about what you told me about https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-dev-tools/blob/master/xwiki-release-scripts/push-release.sh   . Could you ask the person (as I understand it's not you ?) that use that script to get back to us with the errors/problems they encounter. It might be simple to fix.  
11:06 <vmassol> martinus\_\_: the problem is that there was no error when I last ran it. So someone will need to debug it I guess  
11:06 <vmassol> AFAIR it's sdumitriu who wrote it but not sure  
11:07 <Enygma`> has joined #xwiki  
11:07 <martinus\_\_> vmassol, no error but only the first file has been uploaded  
11:07 <martinus\_\_> that's it ?  
11:07 <vmassol> yes  
11:07 <vmassol> wait  
11:07 <vmassol> they're all uploaded, that's push\_ow2  
11:07 <vmassol> and that works fine  
11:08 <vmassol> but with update\_ow2 only the first artifact get published  
11:08 <vmassol> for the rest you need to go in the forge UI to publish the rest  
11:08 <vmassol> ie select them in the combo box, specify the type of file, what os they target, and click add  
11:09 <vmassol> (step2 in the ui, for ex http://forge.ow2.org/project/admin/editrelease.php?group\_id=170&release\_id=5896&package\_id=208 )  
11:10 <martinus\_\_> vmassol,  so only the package " # XE Windows installer" is created succefully , for the remaining packages you have to do it manually with the ui, right ?  
11:11 <vmassol> AFAIR the first one is xwiki-enterprise-installer-generic-8.4.2-standard.jar  
11:12 <vmassol> but indeed in the script it('s XE  
11:12 <vmassol> but I'm not fully sure which one gets published  
11:12 <martinus\_\_> vmassol, and there is a /dev/null running on  
11:12 <martinus\_\_> yes it needs debugging  
11:13 <vmassol> martinus\_\_: also would it be possible to remove old artifacts that still linger in that combox box?  
11:13 <vmassol> there are old 6.4.8 artifacts in there  
11:13 <vmassol> that have been stuck for a long time now :)  
11:13 <vmassol> (2-3 years ;))  
11:14 <vmassol> We could remove the /dev/null next time we do a release to check the error we get  
11:17 <martinus\_\_> vmassol, those file sits in your $HOME/incoming ; can you get a shell to it ?  
11:17 <martinus\_\_> so you could remove those files  
11:17 <vmassol> trying (I don't know if I have ssh access)  
11:17 <vmassol> going private with you  
11:19 <vmassol> thanks it worked! :)  
11:31 <martinus\_\_> you're welcome.  
11:32 <vmassol> has quit
